services.name: Haircut
services.description: A fresh, modern haircut with precise cuts for a clean look.

services.name: Haircut + Beard
services.description: A stylish haircut combined with expert beard trimming for a balanced appearance.

services.name: Lineup
services.description: A sharp, precise service to define your edges and keep your look neat.

services.name: Shave
services.description: A traditional straight razor or nape shave that delivers a smooth, crisp finish.

services.name: House Call
services.description: We come directly to your doorstep, delivering crisp haircuts and styling tailored to your needs.

faqs.question: Do I need an appointment, or are walk-ins welcome?
faqs.answer: We're appointment-only to give each client dedicated, one-on-one service. Book online, by text, or by phone. This keeps wait times short and ensures you get our full attention.

faqs.question: Where is your barbershop located, and what areas do you serve?
faqs.answer: Our studio is in Fontana, CA. We also offer house calls throughout San Bernardino County, Orange County, and Los Angeles County. Contact us to confirm availability in your area.

faqs.question: How do I reschedule or cancel my appointment?
faqs.answer: Reschedule or cancel through the link in your confirmation email, or contact us by text or phone. Cancellations made at least one hour before your appointment are eligible for a refund. Late cancellations and no-shows are non-refundable.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, and mobile payments (Apple Pay, Google Pay) in person via Square. Tips are always appreciated and can be added at checkout.

faqs.question: How much does a house call cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing depends on distance from our Fontana location, number of clients, and services requested. The minimum charge is $60. Contact us for an exact quote.

faqs.question: Do you offer early morning or late night appointments?
faqs.answer: Yes, early and after-hours appointments are available for an additional fee. Contact us to check availability and pricing.

faqs.question: Do you cut kids' hair?
faqs.answer: Yes, we cut hair for children of all ages. Kids get the same precision and attention as adults in a relaxed, friendly environment.

faqs.question: Do you have a public restroom?
faqs.answer: No, we don't have a public restroom. Please plan accordingly before your appointment.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: Call or text us at (626) 216-4488, or send a DM on Instagram @etfadezz. We're happy to answer any questions.
